description: Listed Building Application in connection with conversion of disused laundry into a young peoples performing arts centre including alterations to the roof, internal alterations, new entrance with ramp, erection of a plant and plant enclosure, and installation of a signage screening to the north and south of the roof plant (Full Planning Application P100389 also submitted).
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Notwithstanding the drawings hereby approved consent is not granted for the handrails at roof level on the flat roof over the main stair/ lift block unless it can be demonstrated that the handrails would not be visible from the public realm particularly from along Hornsey Road and the internal courtyard.  

REASON: To ensure that the Local Planning Authority is satisfied that the development is undertaken to a very high standard in the interest of visual amenity and to preserve that character of the Grade II Listed Building.
